meanings.sent1: The plastic bottles are recyclable and can be used again.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to separate recyclable items from the trash.
meanings.sent3: The recyclable paper had a second chance at becoming something new.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a recyclable resource, always finding new ways to be useful.
meanings.sent5: The concept of recyclable materials is important for protecting the environment.

meanings.definition: Capable of being reused or reprocessed.
meanings.sent1: The recyclable glass jars were cleaned and ready for another use.
meanings.sent2: Old furniture can be recyclable if given a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: The recyclable fabric was so durable, it seemed to have a life of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a recyclable energy, spreading positivity wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The idea of recyclable products is gaining popularity among consumers.
